name: Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable application to execute malicious scripts on the server.

action--6f796db6-af5f-4be7-b806-4073b0c6.name: Kill malicious process
action--6f796db6-af5f-4be7-b806-4073b0c6.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious PowerShell script.

action--825be8b7-ec3a-45e8-9e80-e4d8c47d.name: Isolate affected host
action--825be8b7-ec3a-45e8-9e80-e4d8c47d.description: Block incoming connections from the malicious IP to isolate the infected host.

while-condition--c29ff5c8-a8f2-4a3c-9fc4.name: Repeat malware scan until clean
while-condition--c29ff5c8-a8f2-4a3c-9fc4.description: Continuously scan for malware until the system is clear.
